hadith.text: Narrated Abu Al-Malih Al-Hudhali:that some women from the inhabitants of Hims, or from the inhabitants of Ash-Sham entered upon 'Aishah, so she said: "Are you those whose women enter the Hammamat? I heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) saying: 'No woman removes her garments in other than the house of her husband except that she has torn the screen between herself and her Lord
